Summary: Was out for pups last call, warm clear night ,
divs: sighting detailsat approximately 11:pm i took my two pups out for last call. it was nice warm so i stood on the back porch looking at the stars. there were several nice bright ones three grouped together as i watched the center one faded away. there was not a cloud or any haze in the sky. then i looked east south east to another group of stars and another star faded out . neither star came back, into view they were just gone. we went inside and to bed. on feb. 27, 09 i took the pups out around 2:am for last call, while i was waiting on back porch and looking down the road at mr. b's campgroung i noticed the dog pen lights were off (he keeps them on so critters will not come close causing hunting dogs to bark). just beyound mr. b's campground is an open field (about an acer) and another campground at c.h. general store. i saw a yellow white light that blinked out instantly. the light was in the shape of a yellow white orb. i did not see the orb move just there and then gone. it was to high to be a light from a camper or a flashlight it was at least 10 to 12 feet highfrom the ground up or more ,and you can not see the all night light at the frount of the store for the trees. i was a little supprised when i saw the stars just blik out and a little stunned to see the orb. i did not feel threatoned or afraid. just a little supprised. one other thing on 2\26\09 when i awoke i did find two brouses on my left side one a dot the other about a finger lingthon my ribs. i have no idea where they came from. a small brouse on my left arm like i had given blood,but i have not it turned from a purple to a yellow center over night and has now nearly vanished. and a small purple brouse on the inside of my thigh right leg just above my knee there dose appear to be two tiny puncture marks inside the brouse. i have no knowledge of where they came from. bar. ps for the last 4-6 weeks there has been an increase in small aircraft activity and helos as well. also this area dose have a military fly over route but not regularly. and you can tell when an aircraft flies over ever the commercial ones.
trends: There have been 17 other sightings in Mayo
